column4: hey, im trying to use AWK to get the number of pages from AWK. Does anyone know how to do it? I'm currently trying to learn the syntax
i mean the number of pages from the output of pdfinfo file.pdf
using awk to get the number of pages of awk? What does that mean?

actually there is no other way, but to read the manual. If you care about it, you can ask "ghostdog" in ubuntuforums.org in the Programming Talk subforum, the guy is the best using awk, perl, sed, and such.
